name: I am not a Monster: First Contact
name_original: I am not a Monster: First Contact
description:
The Albatross spaceship has been taken over by unknown alien lizards. But no monster can escape the unwavering hand of Captain Laser!





Multiple main characters

Experience the exciting story of the confrontation between monsters and starship passengers. Watch events unfold through the eyes of different player characters, each of which plays their own part in the intricate story.

30+ levels

Each level brings new and intriguing twists and turns. Halt the spread of the infection on board the starship and fight dangerous alien monsters while investigating the mystery of where they came from.
